title: Dirk Helbing - Wikipedia
snippet: Dirk Helbing (born January 19, 1965) is Professor of Computational Social Science at the Department of Humanities, Social and Political Sciences of ETH Zurich and affiliate of its Computer Science Department. Dirk Helbing studied physics and mathematics at the University of Göttingen.

title: Prof. Dr. Dirk Helbing | ETH Zurich
snippet: Since June 2015 he is affiliate professor at the faculty of Technology, Policy and Management at TU Delft, where he leads the PhD school in "Engineering Social Technologies for a Responsible Digital Future".
